There are green trees and an open blue umbrella in the foreground left, and some people on the right.

[0-3] Then the man in the striped shirt walks to the right, turns, and reveals a white clown face. The clown walks up to a woman and a man walking to the right. The woman is wearing a blue top and white shorts, and the man is wearing a white T-shirt and khaki shorts. The clown raises his left arm in a bent position, and the woman puts her right arm through the crook of his arm. The three of them walk to the right together. On the right is a green pool with a green fence.
